extendedInfo.description: Make cheap international calls with your Google number. Send free text messages. Place calls and send text messages showing your Google number. Listen to voicemail and read transcripts.Currently only available in the US.IMPORTANT:- You must open Google Voice at least once after upgrading to route calls.- When using Google Voice for Android, both domestic and international calls are placed through a US-based Google Voice access number, and will use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan.

reviews.title: You guys must not know how to use it!
reviews.comment: Google Voice IS my number... I don\'t give out my cell number. I\'ve moved a couple times and had to CHANGE numbers or missed payments. I give out my GV number and just install the app on the new phone. If you look for other apps like GrooVe IP or Talkatone, you can use GV on a phone with NO SERVICE! Can someone say FREE PHONE SERVICE! (As long as your in Wifi) I don\'t know what the people commenting BELOW did, but I\'ve used GV for YEARS now with MINIMAL problems FOR FREE! As far as MMS goes... that IS spotty... seems to only work if it\'s an iPhone user sending the image and the image is sent to the e-mail attached to the GV number instead of a text. But you probably already GET your Gmail on your phone ANYWAY!
reviews.author: William McKinney

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Free texts able to receive text notification with galaxy s4. No pic message. Calling not free. Able to forward texts to other numbers.  Overall really good.
reviews.author: Augustino Pham

reviews.title: Google is Awesome!
reviews.comment: I use Google Voice as my primary voicemail service. What I would like to see in a future update is. 1.) the ability to save or forward my voicemail.  2.) Better notification there are times that I don\'t see a message until I open the app. Even though its running in the background.
reviews.author: Tito Gonzalez

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: Takes like two minutes to send a message, even on wifi. Improve and u will have an awesome app :)
reviews.author: Christopher Jackson

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: I love Google Voice--especially the voicemail function. Unfortunately, the app no longer notifies me when I have new voice messages, so unless I manually check it, I can go days with unnoticed messages. Otherwise it works great. I\'ve used it for international calls, sms, etc. with no problems!
reviews.author: Zachary Burkum

reviews.title: Very helpful.
reviews.comment: Great app and service, but Galaxy s3 multiview compatibility would be a huge credit to the program. Help me out, I want to txt with Google Voice and watch Youtube at the same time.
reviews.author: Allen Morey

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: Its definitely a handy app but I can\'t seem to find a way to add credit using the app.. I have to use the desktop to do that..hope the next version will have that feature..that said Gvoice works out well!
reviews.author: Lakshmi Sreenath

reviews.title: Great service, app needs TLC
reviews.comment: Gvoice is a lovely service and I\'ve been using it for a while now. Unfortunately the app / interface experience on android is inferior to the others (web / iOS). Take a page from whatsapp at least from a reliable delivery standpoint please. That is, efficient queueing of messages to send, etc. (Galaxy Nexus)
reviews.author: Mike L

reviews.title: It is useful
reviews.comment: Four stars just for the awesome potential this gives me. Transcription needs improvement, all conversations with specific contacts grouped together like the stock messaging app, and back button needs to always go to inbox. I use another, separate app for VOIP thru GV ,routed through GTalk. Build this in, please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps Failing to send Mesages
reviews.comment: Worked great for years, but lately it will freeze when trying to send for no reason, despite having good reception. Keeps messages in thr queue for hours, sometimes never sending or receiving. The app has really gone down hill. It\'s faster to log in in the web browser to send texts than to use this app as it is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Always been the Best
reviews.comment: Great everything. But it would be great to have an option to ask for a pin or password to open the app. (Like Dropbox). Please consider many will appreciate it.
reviews.author: Andres Cabrera

reviews.title: Slower than a Google product should be.
reviews.comment: Each update seems to get worse for me. Even on WiFi, sending messages or refreshing inbox hangs the app up indefinitely. Texts sometimes takes over an hour to send in full 4G or WiFi. No excuse for this. Been with Voice since the beginning, but the app is making me consider leaving.
reviews.author: Jared Foley

reviews.title: I love gv but
reviews.comment: I love Google Voice but I gave it a 2 cuz now deleted items stay inbox. Also PLEASE add option to record out going calls, not just incoming calls. PLEASE PLEASE
reviews.author: Irb Uni

reviews.title: No mms yet?
reviews.comment: Visual voice mail is still atrocious. But I love the fact that I can send text messages from my tablet but I wish they would add mms and calling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updated, better
reviews.comment: Great for free SMS and visual vmail. Update on 4/17/2013 fixed some connectivity issues, finally. Needs a better UI for 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add special feature
reviews.comment: The app is great, and the international rates are cheap, but I really wish the app had a add credit button. It is a pain to log online (desktop) and do it because my pc is out of range most of the time. You guys have a view balance button, but a (add credit) button will be very helpful and convenient. Thank you. Hopefully the next update will have it.
reviews.author: eran brown

reviews.title: No push notifications?
reviews.comment: I\'d love to get missed calls as push notifications. It\'s obnoxious that i need to manually refresh to get missed calls/voice mails. I might not be doing something right, but I doubt it.
reviews.author: Cory Manville

reviews.comment: Great Service, but the app... meh
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst app ever created.... it is just a DE-SERVICE
reviews.comment: Have installed it in several smartphones but this app has never worked. Call quality is very bad, can not send MMS overseas, confusing functions, unreliable app., a true deservice to Google users.
reviews.author: George Karagiannis

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: It\'s better but GV hasn\'t been really updated in ages. The service is awesome though and after porting my number to Google, just about everything is integrated. No mms but that\'s not the end of the world.
reviews.author: A Google User
